resources.string: This Privacy Policy describes how CVS Pharmacy, Inc. ("CVS," "we" or "us") may collect information about you through your interactions with us in our stores, or on our websites and mobile applications (collectively, the "Services"). By using the Services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, or about the way your information is collected and used, please call us toll-free at (888) 607-4287.
